p: Among the biopolymers, natural polysaccharides, such as cellulose and starch, and proteins, including zein and silk fibroin, find applications in food packaging, being ecofriendly and fully biodegradable. Furthermore, some of them may be particularly suitable for triggering the release of natural antioxidants, such as polyphenols, useful for increasing the shelf-life of foodstuffs [ 25].
